Dialogue.Speaker: player
Dialogue.Text: Wow that guy definitely drank too much... His insults didn't even make sense!

Dialogue.Speaker: barmaid
Dialogue.Text: Thank you for defending my honor!

Dialogue.Speaker: enemy2
Dialogue.Text: How dare you sling your insults in my town!

Dialogue.Speaker: enemy2
Dialogue.Text: I challenge you to a roast battle. Tomorrow night, be there or resemble a square!

Dialogue.Speaker: player
Dialogue.Text: I better hit the book store to look for some good insults to use tomorrow...
